long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of toxic comments and endless debates? detoxify removes comment sections from social networking sites, letting you focus on what matters.

Why detoxify?

Declutter Browsing: No noisy comment threads.

Stay Focused: Enjoy content distraction-free.

Digital Well-being: Less negativity, more calm.
